name: Sports
description: A comedic brawler-soccer match. Singleplayer now, multiplayer soon.

name: Pocket Volleyball
description: tiny & simple volleyball game

name: Attack of the Murder Hornets
description: A short retro pixel horror game based on Attack of The Murder Hornets, a film by Michael Paul Stephenson.

name: Scuffed Rocket League
description: This fan made game of Rocket League is kinda scuffed.

name: Save the Fish
description: Oh no. The fish is going to die... Save it!

name: Bushfire
description: Fight the Bushfires, Save the Animals!

name: Super Sec Soccer
description: Soccer without the BS!

name: Pico Tennis
description: A simple tennis game for PICO-8. Play against AI or with up to 4 players in local multiplayer.

name: Maze Racers
description: Memorize the map for each maze then race through it before the time runs out. A #LOWREZJAM 2016 entry.

name: A Skier's Journey
description: A Skier's Journey is a small skiing simulator inspired by retros playstation games.

name: You Don't Know the Half of It: Fins of the Father
description: Welcome to the big race, Salmontha; the same race that ended your father 7 years ago. Are you ready?

name: Barles Charkley's Shut Up and Paint
description: You are a wonderful artist.

name: Ping Pong Palz
description: Life isn't always easy, but they meet every day to train for nationals anyway.

name: Deck RX
description: DeckRX is a deckbuilding racing game. Race and card-battle your way for immortality as you unlock new cards, cars, pilots, and hand-crafted race tracks on different planets. Design your racing strategy, build up your deck, combo your cards, and survive to the finish line!

name: Ikimono High: The Visual Novel
description: A visual novel about dating monster girls

name: Randy's Soccer Quest
description: This is a wacky adventure full of sport.

name: Self Portrait (Interior)
description: an epic vr journey inside the belly of an artist

name: Space Explorer Iyo!!
description: A romantic comedy about a human explorer who meets a stingy alien boy!

name: No Crying in Baseball
description: Don't disappoint your dad!

name: Decarathon
description: Sin descripción

name: Ace Tennis 64
description: Go for the matchpoint in this Atari-era inspired tennis simulation!

name: GhostRing
description: Who dares one-button drive into the Ghost Ring ?

name: The Dragon's Prize
description: As the future ruler of Khorinea, you are the heir to a kingdom filled with magic and mystery, but one that is also in a state of decline. When a dragon attacks the castle during one fateful day, you're brought to its tower and kept prisoner. Although your "host" tries to be hospitable, you can't help but notice that it's hiding a very big secret...

name: Twin Odyssey
description: Sin descripción

name: Missing Stars: Act One
description: A visual novel about mental disorders and the people they affect. Made with Ren'Py.

name: Gun Princess 2
description: Save your sister... and a bunch of bats!

name: Masks for Sale
description: I'm late for the masquerade!

name: Bikrash
description: road bike racing game

name: Through the Panels
description: Make friends, cause drama, survive high school!

name: Gunsheath
description: A hack-n-shmup with a customizable sky pirate mech!

name: So you think you can Chad?: An Incel Dating Sim
description: Incel asks Chad's help to get girls to like him. You won't believe what happens next.

name: Cafe Space Angel
description: What on earth is this place... Cafe Space Angel?

name: Reborn Irrelevant
description: Sin descripción

name: Cowboy Football
description: Weird Football Shooting Game

name: Love Rewind: A Magical Time Travel Romance
description: What would you do with a second chance at life?

name: Senpai Simulator
description: Become the senpai that everyone wants to be noticed by!

name: Rhythm Road
description: Fast-paced rhythm game with a retro soundtrack

name: Ballad of the Judgment Night
description: How will you destroy the world?

name: Steventon Street
description: "Lizzy Bennet would've never put up with this..."

name: Monstinder
description: Monster matching madness

name: Mysterious Island Remastered
description: Sin descripción

name: Into Abby's Head
description: Immerse yourself in the traumatic atmosphere of Into Abby's Head and face the loneliness of being in an orphanage.

name: Pathway: Desire
description: A girl finds herself trapped in a cave and must find a way out.

name: Herbert Crawler Post LD Edition
description: A top-down roguelite for LD

name: Ruin's Hold
description: Short VR Horror Game.

name: String 'Em Up
description: Sin descripción

name: A Bad Day
description: A bad day that never wants to end.

name: Gravity Shift
description: gravity also has the shape...

name: Find the exit
description: solve puzzles, kill enemyies, and be out of enemies' place.

name: Trap Ball
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeon Master
description: Control gravity and traps to make your escape as the boss of the dungeon

name: The Outsider
description: A journey of self discovery.

name: Intexistentance
description: Working a perfectly normal shift in a world under reconstruction

name: Blind Affection
description: Sin descripción

name: Trappy Dungeon
description: A very stressful game about a dungeon full of traps. Can you survive?

name: Dungeon Escape
description: Dungeon platformer about a dead adventurer collecting his dropped loot and escaping the dungeon he died in.

name: The Unseen
description:
The Unseen addresses poverty, its victims and their invisibility in our social context.

You experience conversations with poor people of any kind while taking a ride on the Berlin metro. The objective is to talk to all the people you may ignore usually. Getting to know them, discovering their stories or even talking to them will give this stigmatized group of people a face, as well as the underlining social problem.

name: Misplaced.
description: Atmospheric puzzle

name: Glow
description: 2D puzzle platformer where light is a resource

name: In The Shadows
description: Survive in the night from the things full of spite.

name: No Emotions
description: You play as a little vulnerable thing. There are evil people trying to hurt you...

name: Exit the Shadow
description: 2D souls-like action game with nothing but boss battles

name: I Just Want to Be Single!!
description: I Just Want To Be Single!! is a visual novel dating simulation game where the twist is that you do not want to date the cast of eligible bachelorettes. In the game, you play as Aya, a socially awkward girl in her second year of high school, who only wants to make friends. Unfortunately, being a new transfer student starts turning heads and gets the attention of everyone in her class.

name: Homo Evolution
description: Sin descripción

name: Cyber Rescue: Virus Eruption
description: Race through cyberspace to destroy the source of your friend's virus.

name: Zombies Shall Not Pass!
description: Became a zombie and ambush survivors with Leap Motion!

name: SpaceBeaver
description: SpaceBeaver is unusual 2d-action in a circular room. You're playing as SpaceBeaver, who must defend his SpaceDam from evil aliens. Use your weapons and four powerful abilities to show enemies what's what and save the world… SpaceBeaver.

name: Free-Energy
description: The shooting range of the future!

name: Escaping
description: Manage between driving to avoid cars ahead and blowing up the cops chasing you and your friend after a robbery

name: Void-Dogs
description: A third-person rails shooter. Dive through space in the 25th Century in an effort to save mankind.

name: Mech Gun
description: Combine components and pilot your mech gun to victory!

name: Cyber Flyer
description: A 3D vector cyberspace adventure.

name: Dinorage
description: Dinorage is a FPS shooter.

name: Space Kahuna
description:
Are those California waves too bogus for you? Why don't you take a surf in SPACE!!!

Space Kahuna is horizontally scrolling shooter developed as a tribute to silly shoot' em ups from the past such as Parodius, Harmful Park, and Cho Aniki. Therefore don't expect the usual space tropes and get ready for some silly levels.

name: Spice Evaders
description: The Extra Hot Shooting Challenge! Spice Evaders is a retro-style arcade shoot 'em up where you get to destroy spicy food. Can you take the heat?

name: Tub Sub
description: An Army of Ducks... A submarine... and a Tub....

name: Alien Blaster
description: Shoot alien to gain boost!

name: Tactical Retreat
description: Tactical Retreat is a Wave Based Survival Shooter with some basic tasks to perform between each wave.

name: Jukaya
description: Jukaya is an on-rails endless shooter in the vein of the classics with a heavy emphasis on Vaporwave visuals and sound. The game consists of surviving increasingly intense waves of enemies in an attempt to stave off the inevitable setting of the Vaporwave sun.

name: Quick Revolver
description: Use rhythm and strategy to beat enemies in this western epic revolver battle

name: Stacks
description: A simple puzzle game to rearrange the same kind of the pieces in a horizontal row.

name: Strange Bird Island
description: Uncover the twisted conspiracy and fight for survival on an island of strange birds.

name: Pacifist Outside
description: Pacifist Outside is a classic cinematic platformer. An uncompromising experience, where failure is frequent and progress is hard-earned. Play as a brave tribal leader, grappling with strange trials and unknown forces, as he makes a spiritual journey through a dark cave.

name: The Neighborhood
description: The Neighborhood is a 2D team-based slingshot battle game where two groups play against each other as feuding neighbors. Each neighbor is hell-bent on destroying the home of the other by deploying creative weapons in hopes of getting rid of the other neighbor. The game features single-player and local multiplayer modes supporting up to eight players divided into two teams.

name: Robot Zombies
description: This is a 2D platform shooting game.

name: Beat Dungeon
description: Try to survive a dungeon where the monsters move to the beat.

name: Magnetoresistive
description: Dive into The Plague's computer and erradicate all the computer bugs!

name: Doppelganger
description: Run against yourself.

name: Catapult
description: What does a hungry cat do to get some food? Go to the moon of course.

name: Wacky Ship
description: Wacky Ship is a top down space shooter game.

name: Strings of Light
description: Take a moment to introspect as you aim for higher goals.

name: Dragon Gate
description: Dragon Gate is a top down platformer following a koi carp scaling the Yellow River.

name: My Talking Tom 2
description: From the creators of My Talking Tom comes a new global hit game, My Talking Tom 2! In this game, the famous pet cat Tom is going on an amazing life adventure! The coolest cat on the block: Talking Tom is funnier and more lively than ever before!

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Deadlands
description: Experience the cataclysmic conclusion to the Gates of Oblivion year-long adventure in The Elder Scrolls Online: Deadlands. Explore new worlds, discover strange new allies, and bring destruction to Oblivion itself in this new zone and story DLC.

name: Oppressiv Light
description: Trapped with an alien in a lost spaceship, and you're running out of power...

name: Burger For Me
description: Play as a foreign chef learning how to make burgers

name: Crocolike
description: simple roguelike made in pico-8

name: Shadow Asylum
description: An FPS Horror experience where you're locked in an old asylum being chased by husks of shadow.

name: Shadow
description: In Shadow you are a shadow-made person who needs to escape through a door made with shadows, but for this door to open you need to push 3 blue buttons across the scene. You can push these buttons by jumping on them.

name: Material Brave
description: Material Brave is a 2D Fighting / Action game, similar to Duel Savior

name: Shadow Wrangler
description:
Your shadows have split from you and you must guide them to the exit. You can move at will, but the shadows need to be given commands. Pick up command boxes (turn, jump, explode) and drop them where you want the shadows to act.

Take on TEN CHALLENGING STAGES of PUZZLE PLATFORMING BY PROXY.

name: A Drift for the Irresolute
description: You play a video game. Your phone rings.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Waking Flame
description: Continue the battle against Mehrunes Dagon and delve into two exciting new dungeons in the next installment of the Gates of Oblivion year-long adventure,The Elder Scrolls Online: Waking Flame.

name: Just Slide
description: A simple relaxing puzzle game.

name: Just Slide 2
description: Harder than Expected

name: Kung Fu Fury
description: Fight against everyone and be the best ...

name: Robscarf
description: Robscarf is a 2d platform game with a pixel art design.

name: Reset Co.
description: A game about resetting rooms.

name: Dug'n
description: A fast-paced digging game. Get to the bottom as fast as you can!

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Flames of Ambition
description: The Gates of Oblivion year-long adventure starts here! Delve into two new dungeons, uncover ancient knowledge, confront a dangerous new cult, and begin a journey that takes you to The Elder Scrolls Online: Blackwood.

name: Matchkey
description: Push matching blocks together to unlock doors and reach the exit.

name: Little Big Eater
description: Eat, combo, and score points in this small game with a big heart! Can you get onto the leaderboards?

name: Spooky Light
description: Spooky Light is a horror-humor game where you play as an unknown figure in a mysterious dark universe.

name: The Gems
description: A point-and-click / action adventure about a very, very important mission.

name: Landlady: The Lions Roar
description: You are a kung fu master in Pig Sty Alley, use your voice to defect the enemy.

name: Lugaru HD
description: Third-person rabbit kung fu, with a built-in editor

name: Club de Detectives: Caso 01
description: Visual novel of comedy and mystery.

name: Material Brave Ignition
description: This is the fandisc for the action adventure Material Brave, consisting of after stories for the 5 heroines, as well as a new story for the childhood friend Ena. There are additional dungeons during the ADV/ACT part, with new weapons and outfits.

name: Elemental Tiles
description: Use the power of elements to solve the puzzles and reach the exit.

name: Sheldon Cooper Presents Fun with Flags
description: Hello, I'm Dr. Sheldon Cooper, and welcome to Sheldon Cooper presents 'Fun with Flags'. So, fellow flag enthusiasts, what sort of flag questions keep you awake at night?" This a Fan, Fun, Educational, Parody, Pixel Game to test your vexology knowledge, you know, the study of flags, this funny trivia is based on popular tv show "Big Bang Theory"

name: Pet the Duck!
description: Will this little Duck become your friend or foe?

name: I Will Be There
description: A Crazy Ex Girlfriend Adventure!

name: Bunosphere
description: A Bunny in a strange world

name: The Evil Resides
description: Trapped in a nightmare town with monsters crawling in the shadows, can you survive 3 days of scavenging and shooting?

name: Subterranean
description: Delve into the ancient mines, unearthing vast treasures and forgotten secrets.

name: Don't Talk to Strangers
description: You are a kid that loves candy. You just arrived in a new city with your family. And it’s Halloween.

name: Dark Light Swap
description: Light pushes light and dark pushes dark in this puzzle game about negative space.

name: Chinese Takeout!
description: Help Kung Pow take down the Kung Fu Hustlers!

name: Keep On
description: Keep the blob on the stage.

name: Toast Jammer
description: A cute flip-and-match bread game and splats!

name: The Deliverer
description: The Deliverer is a first-person delivery game where you deliver quests as fast as possible!

name: Make or Break: The Routine
description: Are you able to balance work and fun on your way to finish your thesis?

name: Get Off My Planet
description: Fend off annoying humans from invading your quiet planet

name: Mindmazer
description: Only you can help Jimmy to remember the way back home. Remember the path in this game to reach the top!

name: Space Postman Story
description: Space Postman Story is a story rich adventure game.

name: Legend of Serigel
description: An air of loneliness shrouds the village.

name: Endless Q
description: Classic Q-Bert inspired gameplay cranked up for quick frantic play sessions. Bright and colorful, frantic arcade fun!

name: Air Ace
description: Air Ace is a basic old-school shmup game.

name: Baldr Bringer Extend Code
description: One day, Fuji and others receive a rescue signal from Hristina, a girl who calls herself "VERTEX ORDER 4". The party heads to the virtual space "Naraku" that continues to absorb information and investigates the cause of the abnormality.

name: Thumb War
description: Fight thumb gladiators in the Collose-thumb!

name: Dreamscape Journey
description: Explore your thoughts in an ever shifting dream world.

name: SpaceShooter
description: A rubbish space shooter

name: The Radio Station
description:
The Radio Station is a Japanese psychological horror game. It gives the player an atmospheric, photo-realistic graphics intensifies the horror experience.
This game is primarily a "walking simulator" genre with puzzle-solving elements.

name: The Hero Business
description: Equip wandering explorers as they delve into monster-filled dungeons!

name: In the Shadows
description: In the Shadows is a platformer about hiding from a watcher.

name: An ExScourgeon Through Space and Time!
description: Go on an inter-dimensional adventure as the Pied Piper!

name: Sunset Squid
description: Swim fast as lightning in Sunset Squid!

name: Sub Hunter
description: Use tilt controls and strategic timing to win the day! 12 Stage Campaign + More!

name: The Great Tsunami
description: Ride the wave and help our hero Tsunami to rid the sea by monsters of Japanese mythology!

name: Which Came First?
description: The Chimpken or the Egg?! Use your egg to collect chimpkens to gain points or speed run your way through, but remember the larger the edd, the hard to control and falling off will lose you points! This adorable low poly game will have you fighting for the fastest time and the highest score! Can you speed run your way through to find out, "Which Came First?".

name: Blower
description: Blower is an ode to nature in which you have to harvest flower petals using your portable blower!

name: You Are Undead
description: You didn't survive the zombie apocalypse and now you are a brain eater undead feeding on the last remnants of humanity. You will use freaking creepy mutations and lurk among the shadows to hunt your prey. There is a brief tutorial, but it's up to you to discover the special abilities of the infected ones.

name: Questizin
description: A short action RPG. You are a brave hero trying to open up the path to the east through a misterious cave. The game features 5 sets of equipment, 4 enemies with particular attacks, 4 very nice npcs and a main quest to be solved with a final puzzle.

name: Glass Walls
description: Glass Walls is a 3D, 3rd-person puzzle game featuring a unique perspective switching mechanic, a surrealist visual style, an original soundtrack, and an intergenerational story about mothers and daughters. Playing as 3 generations of women, players swap between different perspectives to solve intricate puzzles and discover the stories behind each of them.

name: Into the Mosswood
description: Into the Mosswood is a very short micro-game that will take ~15 minutes from beginning to end. It's a fairy tale. WASD or arrows to move, F to interact.

name: Legend of Sunflower
description: Legend of Sunflower is a game about a sunflower that needs water to survive, and that is faster at daytime and slower at night.

name: Art of Not Getting Found
description: Sometimes the only way of getting to your destination is by getting lost...

name: A Melon's Tale
description: A discarded water melon decides to help those in need.

name: The Iceberg
description: Theme: "Archaeology". Arrow keys to move. Walk into things to interact. If you are on mobile, swipe to move.

name: Slow Down
description: Blast 'n bop your friends in this Local Multiplayer Arcade game! (2-4 players)

name: Scarlet and Blank
description:
In 1888 in Yoshiwara, the pleasure district of Tokyo, a man meets a woman. Soon after, the illustrious escort Hakuhi dies, her throat slit by a gilded silver hairpin.

So begins a tale of the events leading up to her death, told from the perspective of one man who loves her and another who hates her more than life itself.

name: Octave
description: Open-world musical puzzle game where the notes you play influence the world around you.

name: Pitch Shift
description: Beginning again and again can be a whole new journey with just the right shift.

name: Turnin' Tail
description: Use the power of perspective to find the animals that escaped from the pet store!

name: Frank Hawk
description: Skateboarding Endless Runner with Tacos

name: Meet the Mole
description: A small jump game that rewards you even if you fail.

name: MetaphOrder
description: A mindblowing asymmetric coop game

name: TuRT ToSS
description: Use your skateboard to save these TURTS!

name: Map Hopper
description: A 2D Puzzle Game with Multiple Levels and 1 Goal - Feed the Fox.

name: Robo-Summit
description: A perspective changing game about 2 robots who need to cooperate to reach the summit of a mountain

name: Eridu
description: A weird art game where you collect artifacts, walk around, avoid ghosts with randomly generated islands until you get bored.

name: Rick Shaw's Radical Rickshaw
description: Grab townsfolk and transport them in this wild reimagining of crazy taxi.

name: Hell on Ice
description: A small game about skating with deranged snowmen

name: RoboSk8r
description: Help a roller skating robot navigate the perils of the skate park!

name: Mollie
description: Mollie is a platformer where jumping separates you from your skateboard.

name: Nagamaki Grind
description: Nagamaki Grind is a 2D hack and slash platformer with skate mechanics. You play as radical ronin samurai Timoshi (Tim to his friends), who has mastered their blade. Perfecting the art of bladeboarding: using their long-handled nagamaki as both deadly weapon and as a skateboard with which to skate the rooftops of Edo Japan.

name: KMG Tournament: Kiss More Girls
description: KMG Tournament is a collection of small local multiplayer sports games ranging from 2 to 8 players in which you win by kissing your teammates and opponents.

name: How to Train Your Human
description: How to Train Your Human is a video game about cats using themselves as sleeper agent weapons to take down humanity.

name: Kickflip the Horse
description: Explore the world as a horse.

name: Dismaya
description: A bard walks on a journey of self- discovery.

name: Hugbot
description: Use the power of hugging to defeat robots!

name: Kyle's Monster Adventure
description: Get the monster energy and harness the power to become one of the legendary Kyles.

name: Quality Television
description: Those guards never knew what hit 'em.

name: Silly Skateboarding
description: A game about doing skateboarding with an unstable skateboard!

name: Tunnel View
description:
Puzzle your way through only one dimension. Solve some colour shenanigans, navigate the limited space and bend the dimension using mirrors.
Solve 14 stages, then get one of two endings. The game explores trust, blindness and the importance of grey area, but for all of that, you'll need to see both endings.

name: Tungsten Orbital Destroyer
description: Tungsten Orbital Destroyer is a game about an unconventional weapon. TOD offers cutting edge 3D graphics combined with an awesome retro soundtrack.

name: Racing Wars
description: Racing Wars is a local solo or multiplayer car racing game on AirConsole. It features power-ups that give players different abilities or equipment. To win the game a player must score 10 points or finish the race with the most points. To score points you must stay within the camera play area at all times by avoiding being hit by other players and by evading obstacles.

name: The Tick of Guilt
description: A short, interactive story about how the choices we make affect the lives of others.

name: Get Rich!
description: Push the buttons! Kill the people! Get the money! Get Rich!

name: BodySlam!
description: Oil Wrestling Simulator

name: Alien Crab in the Ghostmaze
description: You are an alien crab, and you were told that the most powerful weapon in the universe was hidden in this maze. You finally found a way to get there, but of course things won't go as expected...

name: Duck Attack
description: Click to drop bread and point ducks where to attack. WASD or ARROWS for movement. Use your power to control ducks and defeat the 4 golems.

name: Udom Nebdon
description: Udom Nebdon is a short fixed camera adventure horror-themed game.

name: Her Majesty's Apathy Bomb
description: Her Majesty's Apathy Bomb is a first person narrative game. It's a short, narrative game with six different endings, depending on how well you listen to the narrator.

name: Frazzle Dazzle
description: All your friends have frazzled hair. Use you mighty blow dryer to fix that!

name: Tic Tac Toe Battle Royale
description: Do you like strategy, competitiveness, and most importantly a lot of fun? Tttbr is perfect for you. Build your own strategy to win on the battlefield from scratch, in the popular tic tac toe game, playing against 3 other players. Open Chests for new phenomenal skins and flex them in-game.

name: World War Robot
description: Defend the Trenches Against Hordes of Robots

name: Pebble's Bakery
description: Play a bear running a bakery.

name: Drybreed
description: Hidden behind the void, an ancient mystery awaits his completion.

name: Ageless Machine: Cup of Tea
description: Puzzle adventure game

name: Allergy Assassin
description: Exploit your enemy's weakness

name: Sword Fishing
description: Fish for fights in this turn-based battle game.

name: Nail Gun Hero
description: Press arrow keys to move, X to shoot, trap enemies and pop them!

name: Garden of Strife
description: An Infested Garden

name: Slam Jam Bakery
description: Action platformer where you take on deadly airships armed with a jam cannon!

name: Astro Error
description: Our character, who fell to a planet as a result of our ship's malfunction, collects the parts of our ship and tries to get rid of the planet by restarting the ship. have the right to carry a maximum of one piece. With energy crystals, it can charge our radio and call reinforcements.

name: Star Wars: The Fighter II
description: Searching for an exciting game about space? You found it! Star Wars: The Fighter II is a Star Wars themed space shooter.

name: Mud and Pixels
description: Sin descripción

name: Heartland
description: Home meant something different to all of the members of Team Heartland, but one thing was common, a change in home is never easy. Home is something crafted over time, it holds memories and experiences. Heartland explores how both home and our way of life can change unexpectedly through experiencing the last perfect day of a family.

name: Tower of Babel
description:
Tower of Babel is different and original. It was created for people who want to make the most out of the time they spend together. The main rule of the game: just build a tower! You are not cooperating with the other players but you are competing against one another. All players will build the same tower. When you drop the blocks, you have to be really careful, otherwise the tower will come crumbling down. The player who breaks it will lose the game. So your goal is to stay safe and build wisely, while trying to give your opponents a hard time and "helping" them to crash it.

Powerups can make your task more difficult, but they make the game more interesting as well. Test your building skills and see how high you can go together. Then find out who is the best builder in the group!

name: SteamWorld Headhunter
description: An upcoming third-person co-operative title in the SteamWorld Dig universe. This installment will make the leap to the third dimension for the first time in the history of the SteamWorld franchise.

name: Marshal
description: Sin descripción

name: 1921: Shadow of the Old World
description: A spiritual successor to the 3D game called "Old World", set in Russian Civil War (1917-1922).

name: War Flags 1
description: Interesting puzzle game with flags based on World War One.

name: Chromavaders
description: 80's-style arcade puzzle shooter mashup.

name: Runnervania
description: Runnervania is a unique mash-up of linear runner and action-exploration games.

name: Gemina Umbra
description: Gemina Umbra is an interactive narrative game. The spirits are watching.

name: Shit Country Sweeper
description: Shit Country Sweeper is a Minesweeper variation. Clean after yourselves.

name: A Frog Took My Sister
description: A Frog Took My Sister is a retro-like arcade action puzzler, as if that was ever a thing.

name: Mucho Muscle
description:
Grab, hang, swing and grapple your way to victory in this ultimate contest of strength, technique and… uh… beefiness. Choose your athlete from among a delightful lineup of miraculously muscled lads and ladies and play with up to three friends.

Mucho Muscle is a hilariously goofy climbing game that you can play as a solo player, as a cooperative adventure, against each other and in team versus team mode. Win the show on your own or work together with a friend to outmatch the opposition – or crack the highscores!

Mucho Muscle combines a gloriously colorful eighties’ aesthetic with the competitive air of ninja warrior contests, offering a wonderfully whacky way to challenge, entertain and delight you and your friends or family.

name: No Fly Zone
description: 2D arcade style top down shoot-em-up.

name: Cielo Segreto
description: Cielo Segreto is a puzzle-adventure game taking place in an oneiric Adriatic.

name: Karaoke Ninja
description: The only stealth game where you make noise to win!

name: Crushing Reality
description: Hack into game's system in order to beat unfair levels.

name: Rosa's Trip
description: Happy fun times ahead, yay! Click to move and talk.

name: Astropover
description: Astropover is not an easy game to run through. It’s important to remember where your opponents appear. There is the possibility to start a level again or you can even jump to the next level. This game was created combining 2 incompatible genres: a mixture of Jump & Run and Bullet Hell/shmup.

name: Optical Ball
description: Brutal brick-breaker.

name: Gustavo Go!
description: Run, jump and dash to the beat to gain speed and contest with others' times in this fast-paced rhythm platformer.

name: Snekman
description: Pacman and Snake! Two Arcade Classics Mashed together!

name: Wild-Gun
description:
This is a game with unique mechanics and atmosphere. It resembles old slot machines where you had to shoot a pistol in a game about the wild west.

The game calculates the movement of the phone in several ways:
- tilt the phone away from yourself down (shot)
- tilt the phone to the left (reload)
Before firing, you need to pull the trigger with your thumb. Thus, there is almost an imitation of a real weapon. 6 rounds in a revolver, all almost for real!

The game has 3 modes:
- Duel (you can fight against a friend or AI) Your task is to pull the trigger first and shoot at a certain moment. It would seem simple, but the atmosphere can get heated to the limit, and rustles and sounds around to confuse, because this is the Wild West, here you need to be alert to the end! Especially when your life and the honor of a real cowboy are at stake! Prove that you are the fastest in the Wild West!
- Saloon. Is there a real Wild West without a brawl at Saloon? Of course not! Shoot your enemies, throw dynamite at them and try not to miss the dexterous jumping cowboys. Play alone or with a friend, score points and compete!
- Chasing or robbing a train. Yes, you were not mistaken - a horse, a train, a robbery! The goal is to catch and rob the train in the shortest time. A real cowboy will never miss the opportunity to get a little rich. All that is needed is to shoot a dozen enemies, detach several carriages with the loot and at the end find the key to the main chest with gold coins! Try to do it faster than anyone!

name: Run for Love

And don't worry about any silly paradoxes or anything, those work themselves out. Just get through quickly, efficiently, and leave no loose ends.

Items you equip will alter the temperate your mech produces, too much heat and your lil’ robot becomes unstable and will explode after a while! Other things causes heat damage so be careful! You can always de-equip items to lower robot’s temp if needed.

name: Face Your Fears 2
description: Face Your Fears 2 is a survival horror game. You are presented with two scenarios that focus on the mysterious Harvest House and Harvest Familly. The game highlights specific fears in each chapter.

name: Almora Darkosen
description: A game created with passion by one person! Almora Darkosen is a retro style hack and slash, role-playing game set in a fantasy world.

name: Morbid Metal
description: Morbid Metal is a Hack 'n' Slash, Action Rogue-lite, where you can shapeshift into unique characters to slaughter enemies with powerful combos. Switch characters in real-time to unleash your power and fight your way through hordes of deadly machines and intense bosses.

name: Pokémon Prisme
description: Pokémon Prisme is a French fangame developed since 2012 and will make you travel through the different regions with a brand new story mixing the anime, the games and the Pokémon Adventures manga.

name: Genpei Ryouran Emaki: Gikei
description:
The latest historical adaptation from Inre, focusing on the late Heian period.

Protagonist Kanou Yoshitsune is the son of Kanou shrine keeper's family.
He is going to a school with other two. One is his sister Roko, and the other is childhood friend Shizuka.

They go to Kyoto with school trip, but Roko goes missing in Kuramadera. Yoshitsune and Shizuka goes to Kuramadera to find her, but they loses consciousness in the main hall. When they woke up, they were still in Kuramadera but something was different.

They were in Heian period, which is about 850 years ago.

name: Pokémon Jaspe
description: Pokémon Jaspe is a French Pokémon fan game, it tells the story of a trainer looking for his brother through an open world.

name: Kid A Mnesia Exhibition
description: Kid A Mnesia Exhibition is an upside-down digital/analogue universe created from original artwork and recordings to commemorate 21 years of Radiohead’s Kid A and Amnesiac.

name: Archery Club
description: Archery Club is an archery game with multiple exciting game types and an extensive upgrade system. Become a master archer, collect the best equipment and win!

name: Neon Hell
description: Do you have what it takes to tackle the Neon Hell? This exciting and fun game for everyone has one of the most difficult levels you have ever seen that you need to complete in order to show your prowess. You have to be quick and decisive with your movements and have a strategy going into each level. It’s a very engaging game with endless gameplay because you can always test out new ways to enjoy the experience and immerse yourself as much as possible. Features: Fast-paced gameplay Intense, fun, and enjoyable mechanics 45 unique levels

name: Ghosts and Apples
description: You have come to a house full of magic where intrigue and mystery reign. A ghost spies through the window while an octopus acts as a coat hanger. A raven is guarding the evil potion brewing cauldron. And, in the distance, a vampire is about to awaken… Your soul has been trapped within the puppet Jack. Wander around and unravel the mysteries of the ancient inhabitants of the House of Frantic Pictures. Beware, though, strange pictures will suck you into a haunted world. Catch the ghosts and turn them into tasty apples. Put your skills to the test and get hooked by a unique gameplay that combines action, strategy, reasoning and memory. Accumulate golden apples and gems to buy the keys of every room within the mysterious house. Over 150 handcrafted levels designed to thrill. Play with Jack and Shelly and enjoy two distinct gameplay styles. Dozens of trophies to win. Unlocking them will test your skills and wit. Find secret rooms that only the best may access. Customizable local multiplayer will provide you and your friends with exciting challenges. Immerse yourself in a fabulous and detailed world where in every corner you will discover extraordinary creatures. Enjoy the evocative hand-drawn art style. Animated for an adventure full of wonder and magic. The compelling soundtrack and original sound effects bring the game world alive and real. A help mode for color-blind people is available.

name: Spacetime Odissey
description: Spacetime Odissey gives you the opportunity to feel the excitement of traveling in space and exploring planets like you've never felt and seen before. The game has amazing graphics and physics that simulate space as it is in real life! With your allied army, defeats alien enemies throughout different solar systems and their telluric planets, destroy enemy bases and conquer the universe!

name: Plumber Puzzles
description: Here you get to test out your skills and push them to the next level while you try to connect the two parts of the screen with a continual pipe. There are 4 main stages with 100 levels each, so there’s no shortage of content for you to enjoy. Each level gets increasingly difficult, so you really have to test all your skills and work hard in order to win. This is an incredible, exciting way to test yourself and push the boundaries in a creative and rewarding manner. Give Plumber Puzzles a try today and we guarantee you will have an amazing time!

name: Arcade Archives: Black Heart
description: Black Heart is a shooter released by UPL in 1991. Taranith, absolute ruler of the Dark Forces, has kidnapped Jeanne. Zil must mount his dragon and take to the skies, assaulting the enemy castle to save her. In order to defeat the boss, work together with the fairies that accompany you and the pixies that allow you to fire powerful attacks when you collect them.

name: H.I.C.H.
description: H.I.C.H. is an online action game! Show and prove your skills in PvP shootouts, PvE missions, online drift and street races among other players-rebels and earn respect among them!

name: Exertus: Redux
description: Exertus is a first-person action platformer with free-run and old school FPS inspired movement mechanics. Through use of the fluid movement set within the game and the dynamic level elements, players have the simple aim of getting from point A to point B, either by using the beaten path or the off-path environment in the semi-linear levels.

name: Battle Bundle I Stickman: Far East Battle and Battle of Archers
description: Action-packed gameplay with an extensive campaign from Stickman with pure fun and multiple multiplayer modes from Battle of Archers. Grab Battle Bundle right now and engage yourself in the most exciting and rewarding game experience!

name: Horseshoe Crab Rescue!
description: It's breeding time for the horseshoe crabs, which means they will come to the beach to lay and fertilize eggs. Horseshoe crabs have been around for hundreds of millions of years, but they have one weakness - if they get flipped on their back on the beach, they get stuck! Luckily, humans can help them out. In Horseshoe Crab Rescue!, you will help out these amazing creatures by flipping horseshoe crabs that have gotten stranded on their backs. Hurry around the beach and try to rescue as many horseshoe crabs as you can before time runs out! Horseshoe Crab Rescue! is a casual game with light educational elements. Play through 15 stages of increasing difficulty while trying to beat your top scores, and learn a few facts along the way.

name: FishWitch Halloween
description: Grab your diving gear and join Beatrice, the guardian of the seven seas, in this enchanted underwater Halloween adventure. Enjoy addictive gameplay as you earn money to decorate a sanctuary with colorful fishes and awesome thematic ornaments. As your sanctuary progresses, you get diamonds with which you can buy cool power-ups to help you beat the levels. Match your way through the wonders of the marine life and explore a bewitching underwater world. Get hooked on FishWitch Halloween.

name: Air Racers
description: Air Racers is an arcade air racing game with different game modes, power ups and splitscreen multiplayer. Five different tracks with different game modes and difficulties make your races different. Race Solo in Time Trail mode and hunt for the best track time, go into the championships solo or splitscreen or just have an arcade race against the AI solo or with a friend.

name: BeatTalk
description: Do you find it difficult to understand spoken English or struggle to get your intended meaning across when speaking English? You've been studying for years, but...why does it seem so hard? The answer may be the difference in rhythm between Japanese and English. In this game, you can easily visualize the timing of English pronunciation by using the rhythm game style of play! The characters in the game will boldly deliver English speeches for you. As you play the rhythm game you will begin to experience the bouncy beat that English has. Whenever you press a button you can speak the word out loud along with the game's natural pronunciation. Before you know it, you'll find yourself naturally saying a lot of English!

name: Joojee's Journey
description: In this whimsical narrative adventure, you’ll play as Joojee, a lovable bunny who suddenly wakes up without her memory. Armed with nothing but her charm and a mysterious magic brush that allows her to enter anyone’s mind, Joojee goes on a journey to recover her lost memories while helping others overcome their own troubles.

name: Box That Ball
description: Box that ball is a ball physics puzzle game. You place the ball into the square and apply a force by dragging back in the right angle to throw it into the box.

name: Zombie Is Planting
description: The future of severe environmental pollution after the nuclear war. Farm with the help of zombies that are not at risk of infecting you. Nature recovers as more and more trees and grass grow. Can you revive the polluted Earth for the future?

name: Football Manager 2022 Touch
description: Tacking the quality and finesse of the full simulation experience, Football Manager 2022 Touch allows you to dictate the tempo as you compete for the beautiful game's biggest prizes. Whether you're challenging for the title on the go or tinkering with your tactics while docked to the big screen, you’re empowered to delegate the finer details to your dedicated backroom team. Maximize the overhauled Nintendo Switch controller functionality and enhanced user interface as you focus on the most essential parts of management – tactics and transfers. Where you begin your journey is down to you; there are 123 leagues from 53 of the world’s biggest soccer nations to choose from. It’s time to deliver moments to remember for the fans at your club. Once you’ve walked through the stadium gates and jumped into the managerial hotseat, it’s time to stamp your style on the field. Hit the ground running with one of the many tactical presets, modelled on the world’s most popular styles, priming your squad for success on Matchday. For those of you that don’t like to follow the crowd, there’s a custom setting for you to break new ground with your own tailored approach. Let your scouts power your recruitment as you assemble a dream squad full of global superstars and wonderkids. You won’t have to wait long to see those prospects become global superstars as you blast through the seasons, filling your club’s trophy cabinet as you take the game by storm. When Matchdays roll around, the choice is yours – you can…

name: Mercenaries Rebirth: Call of the Wild Lynx
description: Mercenaries Rebirth is a tactical RPG set in a fantasy world. Battles occur on quarter-view maps with height differences, wherein the front, back, and side of the map determine each battle’s outcome. Support effects depend on where allied characters from your party are in position, etc., features of high strategic maneuvers. Talented Illustrator Makimura Shunsuke-san is the appointed character designer! Beautifully drawn characters play more active roles with rich facial expressions that vary from joy, sadness, anger, etc.

name: Arcade Archives: Libble Rabble
description: Libble Rabble is an action puzzle game released by Namco in 1983. Control Libble and Rabble to bashishi various characters. When you bashishi all the Topcups that pop out of treasure chests, a miracle will occur that allows you to enter a bonus stage. Remember treasure chest locations and aim for a high score.

name: Him & Her 3
description: Help the cutest video game couple to meet once again. A puzzle platformer with an unique gameplay mechanic. Only love can win in the end.

name: Air Strike: WW2 Fighters Sky Combat
description: The Arcade Shooter Game has arrived and it brings you one of the most compelling and satisfying experiences in the world! Enjoy the unique atmosphere of WW2 and discover the air combat shooter with outstanding retro graphic style!

name: The Adventure of Ravi 'n' Navi
description: "Radiant Rabbits" is a village where rabbits and fairies live in peace. Ravi and Navi have to defeat the great demon king "Shivarra", who is planning to destroy the village! The main character, rabbit "Ravi", joins forces with fairy "Navi" and sets out on an adventure to collect the "Sacred Carrot", the source of happiness hidden by Shivarra. On their way, they are greeted by a variety of tricks and unique characters. They can compete in boat races with beaver, ride a minecart down a mining railroad, and even play retro arcade games! As they progress through the story, they can take advantage of the increasing number of actions, use the coins they've collected to buy dress-up items in the souvenir shop, and more... There's so much to do in Ravi world! Let's go on a great adventure with Ravi 'n' Navi!

name: Dungeon Adventure
description: Dungeon Adventure is a game where you are exploring massive dungeons with the hope of getting out alive, while also eliminating all the enemies. There are lots of things you can find in there, from powerful enemies to some of the best gadgets and coolest items. But be aware, you might not be able to come out from that place. Grab Dungeon Adventure right now and engage yourself in the most exciting and rewarding game experience!

name: Destructivator SE
description: The year is 2145. Earth still burns. Zallagor and his army have been vanquished, but at great cost: the once great cities of Earth lie in ruin, its population hungry for revenge. Zallagor’s home planet of Zerkl has been located. Zallagor has gone, but somebody will rise to replace him. Maybe they already have. The Destructivator is ready – it is time to strike! Take on the role of a tiny super-solider decked out in lime green spandex! Blast and melee your way through hordes of alien soldiers, robots, spaceships, traps, bosses – and more! Fight on foot or commandeer an enemy ship to take out Zerkl’s defenses and ensure that the alien menace won't threaten Earth ever again.

name: Sicari Remastered
description: Set in an original world with its own cast of characters, this hack is a 68 exit-long adventure, with many of the levels having their own unique theming, with all of the graphics being original and hand-drawn. Play as Sicari and her cyborg friend K-16, as they embark on a quest to stop the Goddess of Dimensions from invading their realm.

name: Battle of Archers
description: Battle of Archers is an exciting archery game where you need to do everything you can in order to battle your enemies and win. You can face other archers, hunt birds or you just play against a friend if you want. In Battle of Archers, you will also need to follow birds and try to catch them with your bow. It’s an exciting and fun arcade game that’s testing all your skills while improving your aim. You will find it a very creative and enjoyable experience that everyone should try out. If you love archery or testing your aim, this is the game for you!

name: Sealife Safari
description: Single Player, HD (High Definition). Photograph the sparkling personalities of 60 fascinating fish and explore 5 unique deep sea destinations. Take your picture-taking skills to the next level by creating memorable photo albums! The fun never stops as you uncover secret routes, discover hidden items and encounter special fish appearances. Unlock the full game now for an adventure the whole family can enjoy!

name: TV Yarou Nanana: Get the Scoop!
description: Sin descripción

name: Catana
description: Guide Catana as he masters the attacks that will save not only the monastery but also the world beyond it. With point-and-click simplicity, you'll create matches that eliminate groups of enemies, unleash powerful special attacks and take down crafty bosses.

name: Insect Seeker
description: Finding game for insects and animals hidden in photographs

name: Moonsters
description: Moonsters is a monster collector adventure game that takes place in Lunar region. Dive into a new world as you learn about Moonsters and discover just what great powers they possess along this valorous tale!

name: Little Stars
description: A relaxing puzzle game set in the ambience of the night sky.

name: Medieval Arms
description: Medieval Arms is a third person, action slasher game. Engage in hack and slash action vs NPCs, as well as holding control points to win.

name: Rage Chicken 2
description: Happiness is fleeting, the struggle is endless. You click and drag your mouse to direct your jump, and that's all you need to reach the end. The objective is simple - get to the top and escape.

name: The Railway
description: The vibe of a typical Russian train is conveyed through illustrations, sounds, and characters. So, hold your seat on the train!

name: The Game of Squids: Ultimate Parody Game
description: A crazy and colorful runner in a cartoon style, where the player has to go through many rooms with various trials and try to survive. The game contains a huge number of references, parodies and memes to make fun!

name: Clarity of the Soul
description: Clarity of the soul is a psychological horror where the player has to cope with his nightmares after the end of his prison term.

name: I am Your King
description: Be a King and rally your countrymen to fight on the field of battle. Build an army and survive as long as you can while defeating the invading enemies, kill points are multiplied by the size of your army at the time of the kill.

name: Robo Vacuum Simulator
description: Play as a cleaning robot, as you vacuum a variety of unique environments. Whilst listening to a relaxing soundtrack, in this fun and casual simulator.

name: Coolbit
description: Coolbit is a endless synthwave color match game. Beat your record by surviving through lasers while listening to cool retro music.

name: Epic Maze
description: 'Epic Maze' is a third-person shooter game in which you must find your way to the gramophone in a procedurally generated 3d maze by following its music, turn it off, and then return. Trick is to remember your path, do not get lost in witches’ mansion.

name: Wonky Wizard
description: In this relaxed indie adventure game, you play a wizard that can shoot 'mouse-pointer' spells at little mushroom enemies, and whatever else lurks in the forrests... Explore the map, and enjoy the 3D, level based gameplay!

name: Faster Than Possible
description: Try to get the lowest time by abusing triple jump, wall climb, and wall hugging mechanics! The fastest time wins!

name: Barro 22
description: Barro 22 is a racing game with a toy car / go kart style, the next gen for Barro Racing now with the tracks from the first game of the series.

name: Jump! Fork!
description: Foodies boldly rush forward!

name: Electronic Universe
description: Prepare yourself to shoot obstacles across a electronic musical game.

name: Bricky to Me
description: Brick to Me puts you on a Puzzle Platform full of dynamically arranged rooms with a random path to the confrontation with “Space Mania”.

name: RagingFist
description: Battle game of two characters, use one key to perform its nirvana! Players who have never played any fighting games do not need to worry.

name: Puzzlezon
description: Grid-based logic game where your goal is to get to the end of each level. Manage all the obstacles on your way to make a path. Push cardboxes, rotate racks and fill holes with boxes.

name: Too Many Humans
description: Too Many Humans is a real-time tactics action game where YOU play the Zombies. You bring chaos, fear, destruction, death and finally: redemption. Humanity degraded too far into greed and is hurting the planet, your sister, Gaia. Incarnate the God of decay and save the world by eradicating humanity.

name: Dead Way
description: A multiplayer zombie horde style game to play with your friends!

name: Killer in the Cabin
description: You find yourself among a group of survivors of a bus crash in the Norwegian mountains. Rescue is several days away, so to make it out alive, you and the other players have to cooperate in finding shelter, food and water. But one of you is a killer.

name: Memory Lost-Pairs
description: Exercise your memory! Three difficulty levels (EASY, HARD, TRIPLETS). The images are initially 'covered' and the player must click to discover matching pairs. Skilled players can choose TRIPLETS to search for sets of 3 matching images. Every play has randomized locations.

name: Echoed Memories
description: Sequel to "Gaia's Melody: Echoed Melodies." Echoed Memories is a dark psychological love story, with character development, understanding and acceptance at its core. It holds a balance of bright and cheerful to emotional and depressing, and follows the protagonists as they come to terms with their traumas.

name: Airplane Racer 2021
description: Fasten your seatbelts and get ready for this realistic arcade styled flight game. Fly by yourself or in offline versus mode. Unlock new items and tracks as you progress. Play with your gamepad or your keyboard. Race with your opponents with weapons and shields. Follow up yourself on the leaderboard.

name: The Last Cell
description: It is not going to be easy to complete the steps of the game and it will take you some time. Be ready for more difficult challenges in the next chapters. The story of the game will not be told to you in the beginning. Be careful not to mark the end of the world with your choices

name: Shillelagh
description: Shillelagh (Shil-lay-lah) is a fast and frantic arena shooter where players are armed with the aura of nature to defend against destructive, undead monsters.

name: School Trip
description: You've been in a bus crash. And you need find help. You meed person named Winston. Winston is kind person who will help you but first you need help him.Winston asks to look for his gas tank to get the car running. Then he will give you a med kit to patch yourself.

name: 8089: The Next Action RPG
description: 8089 is a fully featured, open world procedural action RPG with randomly generated enemies, items and quests. Customize futuristic weapons with endless combinations in this fun game that doesn't take itself too seriously! VR is fully supported, but not required

name: Aeroplane Blaster
description: Aeroplane blaster - Become a test pilot and test the latest fighter jet to defend your country from attack! Fight hostile aliens in different dimensions to rid the world of the alien threat!

name: ReTox
description: Experience a unique adventure by getting drugs and consuming them in a +70,000 word visualised text game. Explore a hub connecting a variety of locations. Engage in dialogues and read books. Choose different paths to develop several independent storylines in non-linear chronology.

name: Haunted Game
description: A 2D Platform-style super adventure inspired by the classics of the genre!

name: Stella's Spikey Dream
description: Little girl, her stick and an adventure in a 2D card collecting action platformer!

name: Shifting Dungeon
description: Solve interesting puzzles, manipulate shifting blocks to your advantage Various mechanics combined for interesting and fun puzzles

name: Crazy Ludo
description: 《Crazy Ludo》 is a strategy casual game. By continuously attacking opponents to gain points to obtain the final victory of the game, cool cartoon aircraft image, classic turn-based mode, brand-new flying chess combat gameplay, let us experience the fierce battle of aircraft together！

name: Clones Selection
description: Clones Selection is a multiplayer game that can host up to 8 players online in a series of deadly challenges. You will have to cooperate or betray your teammates and opponents to be the best and hope to survive the selection.

name: Ancient Huntsmen
description: In the ancient days, Pangu created the Huaxia world, the lives of the common people were rendered happy. But one day, monsters came to Huaxia world. Huaxia civilization was on the verge of destruction. There are two roles in Ancient Huntsmen for players to rescue the ancient civilization.

name: Liblade
description: Slash, slash, slash. Sometimes you have to dance, sometimes you have to be precise. "LIBLADE" is a side-scrolling action game where you slash and slash by playing the stick. Use the twin-stick slash action to slash down everything and defeat the strongest enemies that stand in your way.
